thread.section_title: Compare Broadband Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Compare Broadband | comparebroadband.com.au
thread.title: Aseem Sharma
thread.title_full: Compare Broadband reviewed by Aseem Sharma

author: Aseem Sharma
title: Aseem Sharma
text: I got call from Compare Broadband, the representative told me that there is no box at my address which is prerequisite to subscribe an internet plan. She guided me well about what to do next which was purely my own pain but she took it as her own problem and advised the best I could do. Later on she also realized that may the address format may not be correct, she took extra effort to confirm that which otherwise would have made me wait for another 2-3 weeks. Eventually she found that the address format (since it is a granny flat) that I gave was not the correct one. I appreciate the effort Compare Broadband takes to give best possible advice to their customer.
